items.title: Thursday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
items.description: Stocks closed higher in volatile trading on Wednesday after President Trump denied he was planning to fire Fed Chair Powell. What's on CNBC's radar Th...

items.title: Coinbase steps into consumer market with stablecoin-powered 'everything app' that goes beyond trading
items.description: Coinbase is looking to reach a new subset of consumers who aren't necessarily interested in buying or trading crypto, the company's core business.

items.title: Despite Trump's tariffs, U.S. stocks with high international sales are beating domestic-focused names
items.description: A recent Goldman Sachs analysis found that the S&P 500 stocks with the greatest overseas sales exposure outperformed those with the least.

items.title: Peter Thiel just bought a big stake in Tom Lee's ether company and the shares are surging
items.description: Bitmine Immersion Technologies recently launched an ether buying strategy and named Fundstrat's Tom Lee chairman.

items.title: Ether is starting to outperform bitcoin – and further gains could be ahead for the crypto, charts show
items.description: Ether is on an upswing as of late, and charts are showing that further gains could be around the corner.
